column4: how do i fix this  E: Type 'n' is not known on line 1 in source list /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nilarimogard-webupd8-lucid.list
Something's wrong with this repo... I'd delete that list: "sudo rm /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nilarimogard-webupd8-lucid.list && sudo apt-get update"
All it does is decreasing read speed
Normally yes, unless you need to worry about compatibility with old Linux systems
